<!--StartFragment-->

**Applications Open for the 2026 Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program at McGill University (Canada)**

![2026 McGill University Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program](https://www.afterschoolafrica.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/McGill-University-Canada-MasterCard-Foundation-Scholarships-2021-for-African-Students.png)

Are you a young African changemaker passionate about transforming public policy, nutrition, health, or agriculture? The Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program at McGill University is now accepting applications for its 2026 cohort.

This prestigious, fully funded opportunity supports academically talented, community-driven individuals from Africa who wish to pursue a **master’s degree** in one of **11 eligible programs** at McGill University in Canada.

- - -

 **Key Benefits:**

* Full tuition fees
* On-campus accommodation
* Monthly personal stipend
* Academic tools and resources
* Pre-arrival and immigration support

- - -

 **Eligibility Criteria:**

* Be a citizen of and currently living in an African country
* Be 35 years old or younger at the time of application
* Hold a bachelor's degree in a field related to your program of choice
* Have never registered for or completed a master’s degree
* Demonstrate strong leadership, service, and a commitment to giving back
* Face financial barriers to education

- - -

 **Eligible Programs (Selected Fields):**

* **Non-Thesis**: Public Policy, Public Health, Human Nutrition (Project), Biostatistics, Biotechnology, Food Safety, and more
* **Thesis**: Animal Science, Bioresource Engineering

- - -

 **Timeline:**

* **Applications Open**: August 4, 2025
* **Application Deadline**: August 31, 2025
* **Admission Stage**: September to January
* **Final Selection**: February – March 2026

- - -

 **How to Apply:**

1. Attend an official information session (required to access the application form)
2. Submit the Mastercard Foundation Scholars Program application by August 31
3. If shortlisted, receive a fee waiver and apply to McGill University

[ Learn more & apply here](https://www.mcgill.ca/mastercardfdn-scholars/)

<!--EndFragment-->
